contentrichtext.text: {{unreferenced|date=April 2010}} :''This article is for the expansion for [[Zoo Tycoon 2]]. For the expansion pack for [[Zoo Tycoon]], see [[Zoo Tycoon: Marine Mania]]. For the mobile phone game, see [[Zoo Tycoon 2: Marine Mania Mobile]].'' {{Infobox VG | title = Zoo Tycoon 2: Marine Mania | image = [[Image:ZT2- Marine Mania.jpg|256px]] | caption = '''''Zoo Tycoon 2: Marine Mania''''' boxart | developer = [[Blue Fang Games]] | publisher = [[Microsoft Game Studios]] | series = ''[[Zoo Tycoon (series)|Zoo Tycoon]]'' | version = 2.3 | engine = [[Gamebryo]] | released = {{vgrelease|NA=October 17, 2006}}{{vgrelease|EU=October 27, 2006}}{{vgrelease|AUS=November 7, 2006}} | genre = [[Simulation|3D Simulation]] | modes = [[Single-player]] | ratings = [[Entertainment Software Rating Board|ESRB]]: E10+<br />[[Office of Film and Literature Classification (Australia)|OFLC]]: PG | platforms = [[Microsoft Windows]] | media = [[CD-ROM]] | requirements = | input = [[Keyboard (computing)|Keyboard]], [[Mouse (computing)|mouse]] }} '''''Zoo Tycoon 2: Marine Mania''''' is the third [[expansion pack]] for the [[video game]] ''[[Zoo Tycoon 2]]''. The expansion focuses around marine animals, as did the ''Marine Mania'' expansion for the [[Zoo Tycoon|first ''Zoo Tycoon'' game]]. ==Gameplay== ===Animal shows=== ''Marine Mania'' introduces shows and an animal training minigame (more minigames were later introduced in [[Zoo Tycoon 2: Extinct Animals|''Extinct Animals'']]) which were previously not in the other expansions of the game. ==System Requirements== As it is an expansion pack, it requires the original [[Zoo Tycoon 2]] or [[Zoo Tycoon 2|Zoo Tycoon 2: Zookeeper Collection]] to play. *[[Microsoft Windows]] 98SE or Higher *[[Personal Computer|PC]] with 733 MHz equivalent or higher processor *256 MB of system RAM *900 MB available hard disk space *32x speed or faster CD-ROM drive *16 MB 3D video card required *[[DirectX]] 9.0 or later *Sound card, speakers or headphones required for audio *Microsoft Mouse or compatible pointing device ==See also== *[[List of Games for Windows titles]] *[[Zoo Tycoon (series)]] ==External links== {{Wikibooks|Zoo Tycoon}} *[http://zootycoon.com/Products/MarineMania/default.htm Marine Mania - Zoo Tycoon.com] *[http://www.microsoft.com/games/pc/zootycoon2mm.aspx Marine Mania - Microsoft.com] {{Zoo Tycoon}} [[Category:Zoo Tycoon|Marine Mania, Zoo Tycoon 2]] [[Category:Blue Fang Games games]] [[Category:2006 video games]] [[Category:Microsoft games]] [[Category:Video game expansion packs]] [[Category:Windows games]] [[Category:Games for Windows certified games]] [[fr:Extensions de Zoo Tycoon 2#Zoo Tycoon 2 : Marine Mania]]
